title: Understanding Analysis in Nursing
text: Analysis in mental health nursing involves more than just collecting data. It requires a deeper understanding of the cues and their implications for patient care.

title: Focus on Cues
text: Consider how analyzing cues can help determine the level of support a client needs.

hintAnswer: critically examining the meaning of identified cues that inform the nurse on necessary levels of support for the client.
title: Defining Analysis
text: What does it mean to critically examine cues in the context of mental health nursing?
choices: the collection of available data to inform care planning, to identify problems and develop a plan of care
critically examining the meaning of identified cues that inform the nurse on necessary levels of support for the client.
the intersection of formal research findings, nursing competency, and the preferences of the client and family to plan client care
